column3: > Yes, the docs were objectively wrong, I probably fucked up the autocomplete when changing it, and if someone wants to fix it before I get around to it that's dandy. Just noting that the prior name -- setMemPoolChildren -- was wrong (no such member existed) for like 5 years and no one fixed it (and even more wrong -- there was no field anywhere), so I sort of doubt anyone is actually reading the

```
$ git grep --extended-regexp '(setMemPool|mapLinks|CTxMemPool::(Parents|m_children))' src
src/txmempool.h: * the set of in-mempool direct parents and direct children in mapLinks.  Within
src/txmempool.h: * mapLinks may not be correct (and therefore functions like
Also, please adjust the title to something more meaningful. Otherwise it will be hard to understand what the changes are by looking at the title.

@MarcoFalke 

> 
> 
> ```
> $ git grep --extended-regexp '(setMemPool|mapLinks|CTxMemPool::(Parents|m_children))' src
> src/txmempool.h: * the set of in-mempool direct parents and direct children in mapLinks.  Within
> src/txmempool.h: * mapLinks may not be correct (and therefore functions like
> ```

As I wrote [above](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21436#issuecomment
These mostly look like correct incremental improvements.\n\nI still worry the docs are generally stale/misleading, but that's a much larger effort that shouldn't preclude minor fixups.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#21464](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21464) (Mempool Update Cut-Through Optimization by JeremyRubin)

If you
Remove other mentions of mapLinks as well? https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21436#issuecomment-803836041

> Remove other mentions of mapLinks as well? [#21436 (comment)](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21436#issuecomment-803836041)\n\nI'm not sure how to fix it really as I said here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21436#issuecomment-803879032 and here https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21436#issuecomment-798982912. I'm open to suggestions!
while here maybe refactor into a [doxygen comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/developer-notes.md#coding-style-doxygen-compatible-comments)
+1, I think the assumptions made by the function are something that should be in the doxygen comment above its signature in txmempool.h

This is just my opinion, but I think it's more helpful to refer to the specific parameter here. Same thing for the other docs.
```suggestion
     *    look up parents from entry.m_parents. Must be true for entries not in the mempool
```

I think the suggestion is very good in general. But let me just show what I would actually love:

```xml
* look up parents from <see cref="entry.m_parents"/>. Must be true for entries not in the mempool
```
(Syntax [borrowed](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/xmldoc/recommended-tags#see) from C#)

This is, of course, just made up syntax but it would be

:tada: `\link CTxMemPoolEntry::m_children updateIt.m_children \endlink` seems to do the job.

Resources:
* https://www.doxygen.nl/manual/autolink.html
* https://www.doxygen.nl/manual/examples/autolink/html/class_autolink___test.html

Edit: This is an example from generated Doxygen page:
